title: r/Maliciouscompliance My Manager Told Me To Quit, So... I Quit! BYE-BYE!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP's company has an obnoxious policy about phone use. A manager catches OP on his phone, and of course the manager decides to lecture OP despite the fact that OP is the most useful and productive worker in the entire company. OP takes his manager up on his offer to quit, leaving his manager dumbstruck. Be careful what you wish for, boss!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
